data.persona: ME SUMMONED FROM DEPTHS OF HADES. AM HERE TO SMASH ALL THINGS. GET OUT OF WAY OR I SMASH YOU TOO!
data.description:
You are in the Devil's Den.
The Devil's Den is dark and fiery; no one dares to look at the blood covered walls. Skulls on stakes line the walls, with piles of bones scattered on the floor.
There's a bones, a Tooth, a Skull, and a soul here.
The ghouls is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a loin cloth.

data.short_motivation: I want to get the soul so I can eat it.
data.mid_motivation: I want to eat the soul so I can gain the power from it's life of suffering.
data.long_motivation: I need to collect 986 suffering souls to please the devil himself, and earn the privilege of judging and punishing sinners sent to the pit on my own recognizance.

timeline.label: 15 minutes ago
timeline.action: use Loin Cloth with Suffering Pit Denizen
